main event: A ground observer reported a light moving as if landing at Misawa AB, Japan, on June 13, 1963.
interesting points: The light appeared and disappeared suddenly after moving in a straight line with sudden upward acceleration., The object was described to be the size of a VX balloon at an altitude of 2000 ft., The sighting lasted for 3-1/2 minutes and included a total of one object., Weather conditions included an overcast sky with surface inversion at 1200 ft., The incident was evaluated as a balloon sighting due to haze and possible reflection from a beacon light.
sighted object: a bright light resembling a balloon
